fields.label: Barbarian
fields.description: A fierce warrior of primitive background who can enter a battle rage

fields.label: Bard
fields.description: An inspiring magician whose power echoes the music of creation

fields.label: Cleric
fields.description: A priestly champion who wields divine magic in service of a higher power

fields.label: Druid
fields.description: A priest of the Old Faith, wielding the powers of nature— moonlight and plant growth, fire and lightning— and adopting animal forms

fields.label: Fighter
fields.description: A master of martial combat, skilled with a variety of weapons and armor

fields.label: Monk
fields.description: An master of martial arts, harnessing the power of the body in pursuit of physical and spiritual perfection

fields.label: Paladin
fields.description: A holy warrior bound to a sacred oath

fields.label: Ranger
fields.description: A warrior who uses martial prowess and nature magic to combat threats on the edges of civilization

fields.label: Rogue
fields.description: A scoundrel who uses stealth and trickery to overcome obstacles and enemies

fields.label: Sorcerer
fields.description: A spellcaster who draws on inherent magic from a gift or bloodline

fields.label: Warlock
fields.description: A wielder of magic that is derived from a bargain with an extraplanar entity

fields.label: Wizard
fields.description: A scholarly magic-user capable of manipulating the structures of reality
